import Style from "./WeatherIcon.module.css"; import React from 'react'; import { UNIXtoDateTime } from "./Utils/Weather.js"; export default class WeatherIcon extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } render() { if (this.props.weatherCode == undefined) { return } return
; } } const iconLookup = { 200: { day: 'cloud-drizzle-lightning-sun', night: 'cloud-drizzle-lightning-moon' }, 201: { day: 'cloud-drizzle-lightning', night: 'cloud-drizzle-lightning' }, 202: { day:
